[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
あの後のスーパーでも同じやり取り。
気まずくてしばらくあの商店街に行けないぞ。
……まぁネコの可愛いところと言われればそうなんだけども。
[バニラ]: 「ん？　くんくん、くんくん……」
[バニラ]: 「あっちからすごくいい匂いがする」
[ショコラ]: 「ほんとだ、すごく香ばしくていい匂いがしますご主人さま！」
[嘉祥]: 「確かに。この匂いは……」
匂いのする方角へと顔を向ける。
[屋台のネコ]: 「いらっしゃいませー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「おいしいできたてのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「あっつあつで、かつおぶしたっぷりのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[ショコラ]: 「わぁ、ネコのたこ焼き屋さんだ！　珍しいですね、ご主人さま！」
reference_answer:
After that, it was the same sort of exchange at the supermarket.
The whole thing was so awkward that I don't think I can visit that shopping district for a while.
... Well, I guess you could say that was the cute side of catgirls.
[Vanilla]: 「Hmm? Sniff sniff, sniff sniff...」
[Vanilla]: 「Something smells really nice over there.」
[Chocola]: 「You're right! Something smells really good, Master!」
[Kashou]: 「It definitely does. What is this smell...」
I turned towards the source of it.
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Welcome~!」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some delicious, fresh takoyaki~?」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some piping hot takoyaki with lots of bonito flakes on top~?」
[Chocola]: 「Wah, it's a takoyaki shop run by a catgirl! That's pretty rare, huh, Master?!」
ModelAnswer:
The same exchange happened at the supermarket afterward.
I can't go to that shopping street for a while; it's too awkward.
...Well, I guess cats *are* cute when you think about it.

[Vanilla]: "Hmm? Sniff sniff, sniff sniff..."
[Vanilla]: "There's an amazing smell coming from over there!"
[Chocola]: "You're right! It smells so fragrant and delicious, Master!"
[Kashou]: "Indeed. This scent is..."

They turn their faces toward the source of the smell.

[Street Vendor Cat]: "Welcome!"
[Street Vendor Cat]: "How about some freshly made takoyaki?!"
[Street Vendor Cat]: "Hot and fresh out of the oven, covered in bonito flakes—how about it?!"
[Chocola]: "Wow, a cat selling takoyaki! That's unusual, Master!"  

(Note: "Takoyaki" is a type of Japanese octopus ball snack. "Bonito flakes" refer to dried, fermented, and smoked skipjack tuna flakes commonly used as a topping.)

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「いい子になれるようにって！」
[バニラ]: 「時雨、厳しい。でもお陰様で色々と覚えた」
[店主]: 「そうなんだ？　良いご主人様なのね」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、でもご主人さまはご主人さまなんです！」
[ショコラ]: 「時雨ちゃんは時雨ちゃんですから！　ね、ご主人さま？」
[バニラ]: 「通訳すると、時雨は大事な友達」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人って呼ぶのはこっちのご主人だけってことで」
[店主]: 「あはは。愛されてるんだね、ご主人さまは？」
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、ありがたいことに」
肘で軽く小突かれる。
照れくさいような苦笑いで返事を返す。
……外だと流石にちょっと照れくさい。
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「She said we'd grow up to be good catgirls if we listened to her!」
[Vanilla]: 「Shigure was tough on us. But thanks to her, we learned a lot.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Really? What a wonderful owner you have.」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, but Master is Master!」
[Chocola]: 「And Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?」
[Vanilla]: 「In other words, Shigure is an important friend.」
[Vanilla]: 「And when we say 'Master,' we are referring to Master over here.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Ahaha! You're a very well-loved "master," aren't you?」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I am grateful.」
She lightly nudged me with her elbow.
I responded with an embarrassed, forced smile.
... Hearing this kind of stuff in public sure was embarrassing.
ModelAnswer:
[Chocola]: "So I can be a good girl!"
[Vanilla]: "Shigure, you're strict. But thanks to you, I've learned so much."
[Shopkeeper]: "Is that so? You have a wonderful Master."
[Chocola]: "Ah, but Master is *our* Master!"
[Chocola]: "Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?"
[Vanilla]: "To translate, Shigure is a precious friend."
[Vanilla]: "We only call *you* 'Master.'"
[Shopkeeper]: "Ahaha. You're loved, aren't you, Master?"
[Kashou]: "Well, I'm grateful for that."
*He's nudged lightly with an elbow.*
*He responds with a wry smile that seems a little embarrassed.*
...Being out in public like this is still a bit awkward.  

(Note: The final line of narration is implied by the context and added to maintain flow.)

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female

Question:
無慈悲な電子音が響く携帯電話を見つめる。
……時雨と連絡さえ付けば、すぐに解決すると思ってたのに。
[ショコラ]: 「はむ、んぐんぐんぐ、朝ごはんおいしーですね！」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまのごはんはいつでもおいしーですにゃー♪」
[バニラ]: 「ショコラ、ほっぺにケチャップ付いてる」
[バニラ]: 「芸術的にかわいい。舐めてあげちゃう。ぺろぺろ」
当の本人たちはサンドウィッチを満足そうに頬張っている。
ちなみに中身はトマトとチーズとレタス。
それに半熟の目玉焼きを挟み込んだシンプルなもの。
朝食だったらまぁこんなもんだろ。
[嘉祥]: 「お前ら、今日こそは家に帰るんだからな？」
reference_answer:
As the ruthless electronic buzz of the dropped call echoed, I stared at my cell phone.
... And here I thought that I could sort all this out if I could just talk to Shigure.
[Chocola]: 「Munch munch munch, breakfast tastes good!」
[Chocola]: 「Master's breakfast always tastes good, meow~ ♪」
[Vanilla]: 「Chocola, there's some ketchup on your cheek.」
[Vanilla]: 「It's cutely artistic. I'll lick it off. Shlurp slurp~」
The catgirls in question were happily stuffing themselves with sandwiches.
These sandwiches incidentally contained tomato, cheese, and lettuce.
With an over-easy fried egg tucked inside all of that, it was a simple meal.
Breakfast was pretty much like this.
[Kashou]: 「You two are definitely going home today, okay?」
ModelAnswer:
The merciless electronic tone rings from the cell phone I stare at.
…If only I could contact Shigure, I thought this would be resolved immediately.

Chocola: "Hamu, mmmnmnmn, breakfast is so yummy!"
Chocola: "Master's cooking is always delicious, nyaa♪"

Vanilla: "Chocola, you have ketchup on your cheek."
Vanilla: "It's artistically cute. I'll lick it off for you. Lick, lick."

The two of them are happily munching on sandwiches.
By the way, they're filled with tomato, cheese, and lettuce,
Plus a half-cooked fried egg sandwiched inside—simple stuff.
That's breakfast for you.

Kashou: "You two, I'm going home today, remember?"  

(Note: "Hamu" and "mmmnmnmn" are onomatopoeia representing eating sounds. "Nyaa" is a cat-like sound Chocola makes.)

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
ハキハキとした笑顔で伝票とペンを差し出される。
[嘉祥]: 「そうですね、えっと……」
受け取った伝票を改めて確認する。
[嘉祥]: 「……どうも、自分が頼んだものと違うみたいなんですけども」
[食器業者]: 「……え、本当ですか？」
[食器業者]: 「それは、品物が違う……ということでしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いえ、頼んだものも確かに入ってるみたいなのですが……」
店内に積まれたダンボールへと視線を向ける。
小さな店内に積まれたダンボールの山、山、山。
むしろ店内がほぼダンボールになっていた。
[嘉祥]: 「見ての通り、ウチではこんなにたくさんの食器は必要ないので……」
[食器業者]: 「す、すみません！　すぐに本社に確認しますので！」
[食器業者]: 「少々お待ち頂いてもよろしいでしょうか！？」
reference_answer:
She smiled brightly and brought out the invoice along with a pen.
[Kashou]: 「Okay, let's see...」
I looked over the sales invoice I received once more.
[Kashou]: 「... Somehow, this doesn't look like what I ordered.」
[Tableware Seller]: 「... Huh, is that so?」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Are you saying that these... aren't the correct items?」
[Kashou]: 「No, the stuff I ordered is in here too, but...」
I looked over at the pile of boxes inside the bakery.
Inside of my tiny bakery was a mountain of boxes. A MOUNTAIN.
It was as if the inside of the bakery had become completely made of boxes.
[Kashou]: 「As you can see, we don't need this much tableware inside the bakery...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I-I'm sorry! I'll check with the main office right away!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Could you give me a few moments?」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "Yes, well… umm…"
*He takes the bill and pen with a clear smile.*
[Kashou]: "…It seems there's been a bit of a mix-up. This isn't quite what I ordered."
[Dish Vendor]: "...Eh? Really?"
[Dish Vendor]: "Does that mean... the wrong items were delivered?"
[Kashou]: "No, it appears everything I *did* order is here…"
*His gaze shifts to the stacks of cardboard boxes piled inside the store.*
*A mountain, upon a mountain, upon a mountain of cardboard boxes in the small shop. The store was practically all cardboard.*
[Kashou]: "As you can see, we don't exactly need this many dishes…"
[Dish Vendor]: "S-Sorry! I'll contact headquarters immediately!"
[Dish Vendor]: "Would you mind waiting just a moment!?"  

*(Note: "ご主人さま" (Master) is not used in the given script, so it's omitted.)*

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[食器業者]: 「こちらのミスで、別の注文書と混じってしまっていたようでして……」
[食器業者]: 「水無月様の方もすぐにご入用と思いますので……」
[食器業者]: 「もしよろしければ、ご注文分の食器を受け取って頂ければと思うのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「注文分を受け取れって……」
[嘉祥]: 「……え？　この中からですか？」
そびえ立つダンボールの山。
思わず言葉に詰まる。
どれも一様に同じ箱なわけで。
中身を開けてみるまで何が入っているのか分からない。
しかも伝票を見ればどれも最高級のティーセットや食器。
なので、扱いにも細心の注意を払わないととんでもないことになる。
[嘉祥]: 「あの、確かに開店準備もあるので今日もらえたら嬉しいですけども……」
[嘉祥]: 「……今からこれを全部って、相当時間かかりますよね？」
reference_answer:
[Tableware Seller]: 「Because of an error on our part, it appears that another order got mixed in with yours...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I imagine that you may be in need of these items right away, Mr. Minaduki...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「So if at all possible, if you would be able to accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「Accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「... Huh? From all this?」
The mountain of cardboard boxes towered over everything.
I was at a loss for words.
Every box was of equal size.
I wouldn't know what was inside each of them without opening them up.
On top of that, looking at the sales invoice, I could see that they all contained expensive tea sets and tableware.
And if I accepted it all, it would be a lot of work to deal with all the new items.
[Kashou]: 「Uhm, there's still things that need doing in advance of my bakery's opening, so I don't mind accepting these...」
[Kashou]: 「... but it's going to take a while to deal with all of this.」
ModelAnswer:
[Tableware Vendor]: "It seems there was a mix-up on our end, and this order got mixed in with another..."
[Tableware Vendor]: "I believe Minaduki-sama will need these items promptly as well..."
[Tableware Vendor]: "If it's convenient for you, we were hoping you could accept the full order of tableware..."
[Kashou]: "Accept the whole order…"
[Kashou]: "...Eh? From all this?"
A towering mountain of cardboard boxes.
He was momentarily speechless.
They were all identical boxes, after all.
There's no way to know what's inside until you open them.
And according to the invoices, they're all top-of-the-line tea sets and tableware.
So, extreme care must be taken when handling them, or there will be serious consequences.
[Kashou]: "Well, since we are preparing for the opening, it would be great if we could receive them today..."
[Kashou]: "...But taking all of this right now is going to take a considerable amount of time, isn't it?"  

(Note: "ご主人さま" (Master) was not used in the provided script, so it wasn't included in the translation. Honorifics like "-sama" were preserved as requested.)

かと言って再配達してもらっても二度手間だし……。
[嘉祥]: 「…………ん？」

[ショコラ＆バニラ]: 「にゃにゃっ！？　にゃんですかぁっ！？」
[食器業者]: 「ネコちゃんたち、本当に助かりました！」
[食器業者]: 「ありがとうございます、ほんとにありがとうございます！」
[食器業者]: 「では私はこれで失礼させて頂きますね！」
[嘉祥]: 「…………はぁ、無駄に疲れた……」
仕分け終わった食器を横目に、
reference_answer:
[Tableware Seller]: 「I have to make it to my next delivery, after all...!」
[Kashou]: 「Look, you don't need to put all this pressure on me...」
From looks of it, it would take two hours or more...
But to have it redelivered would take double the effort, too...
[Kashou]: 「...... Hmm?」
[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「Stare.」
[Kashou]: 「That's right, I have a lifeline!!」
[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「Meow meow?! What is it?!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「You've really saved me, catgirls!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Thank you! Thank you oh so very much!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Well then, I'll be on my way!」
[Kashou]: 「... Haah, I'm exhausted...」
I glanced at the tableware we had finished organizing...
ModelAnswer:
[Dish Vendor]: "I really need to get going for my next delivery…!"
[Kashou]: "Well, I can't exactly put that kind of pressure on you…"
*At this rate, even if I rush, it'll easily take two hours… But having them redeliver would be a waste of time too…*
[Kashou]: "……Hmm?"
[Chocola & Vanilla]: "Stare."
[Kashou]: "Aha! A cat's paw is just what I needed!!"
[Chocola & Vanilla]: "Nyan!? What's going on, nyaa!?"
[Dish Vendor]: "Oh, you cats are a real lifesaver!"
[Dish Vendor]: "Thank you so much, really, thank you!"
[Dish Vendor]: "Well then, I'll be taking my leave now!"
[Kashou]: "……Haa, that was exhausting for no reason…"
*He glanced at the sorted dishes.*

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「……ネコくらい単純に生きられれば、色々と楽なんだろうけどな」
窓に貼られている店の名前に目を向けながら。
苦笑いを振り払って、届いたばかりのティーセットを片付け始めた。
[バニラ]: 「あれ、今日はあのたこ焼き屋がいない」
昨日と同じ夕方の公園通り。
でも今日は屋台は見当たらない。
ネコたちを実家に送ろうにも今日に限って誰もおらず。
俺も実家の鍵は置いて来てしまっていた。
だから時雨が帰宅するまで時間調整で買い物へ。
[ショコラ]: 「……え？　あ、ご、ごめんバニラ！」
[ショコラ]: 「何だっけ、マタタビだっけ？」
[バニラ]: 「だいたいそんな感じ」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「... It must be pretty nice to live the simple life of a catgirl, huh?」
I pondered as I looked at the name of the bakery affixed to the window.
With a bitter smile, I began to clean up the tea sets that had arrived earlier.
[Vanilla]: 「Huh, that takoyaki seller isn't here today.」
Just like yesterday, we took a walk through the park in the evening.
However, that food stand was nowhere to be found.
It just so happened that no one was home on the day I decided to take the two catgirls home.
I had also happened to leave the house key behind.
So to make good use of time, I went to do some shopping before Shigure got home.
[Chocola]: 「... Eh? Ah, s-sorry, Vanilla!」
[Chocola]: 「What was it called... catnip?」
[Vanilla]: 「That sounds about right.」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "...If only I could live as simply as a cat, things would be so much easier."
He glanced at the store name on the window.
Shaking off his wry smile, he began to put away the newly arrived tea set.

[Vanilla]: "Huh? That takoyaki stand isn't here today."
The same park street in the evening as yesterday.
But the food stall was nowhere to be seen.
Even if I wanted to send the cats back to their owner's place, no one is there today.
And I left my family home key behind too.
So, time adjustment shopping until Shigure gets home.

[Chocola]: "...Eh? Ah, s-sorry Vanilla!"
[Chocola]: "What was it again, silver vine?"
[Vanilla]: "Something like that."

metadata:
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ショコラ、疲れたなら少し休んでくか？」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、はい、少しだけ……」
[ショコラ]: 「でも大丈夫ですから。心配かけてごめんなさい、ご主人さま」
[嘉祥]: 「……別に謝ることじゃないだろ」
困ったような笑顔で頭を下げる。
元気がない理由なんか分かり切ってるから。
だから何も言わずにいるしかない。
[嘉祥]: 「じゃあちょうどそこにベンチがあるし、少し休んでくか」
[バニラ]: 「じゃあ私、何か飲み物買ってくる」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、頼む。全員分な」
[バニラ]: 「了解。任された」
バニラに小銭を渡してショコラをベンチに促す。
よく吹き抜ける潮風が公園の木々をざわめかせる。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Chocola, if you're tired, why don't we rest a bit?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, okay. Maybe a little bit...」
[Chocola]: 「... Ah, no, Chocola is fine. Sorry to worry you, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「... There's no need for you to apologize.」
She had a troubled smile on her face as she nodded.
It was pretty clear why she wasn't in good spirits.
That's why there was nothing I could really say to her.
[Kashou]: 「Well, there happens to be a bench over there, so why don't we rest a bit?」
[Vanilla]: 「In that case, I will go buy something to drink.」
[Kashou]: 「Ahh, thanks. Something for everyone, okay?」
[Vanilla]: 「Understood. Leave it to me.」
I handed Vanilla some change and offered the bench to Chocola.
The constant sea breeze rustled the trees in the park.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Chocola, if you're tired, why don't you take a short break?"
Chocola: "Ah, yes, just for a little bit..."
Chocola: "But I'm alright. Sorry for making you worry, Master."
Minaduki Kashou: "...You don't need to apologize."
She lowers her head with an apologetic smile.
He knows exactly why she's feeling down.
That's why he can only remain silent.
Minaduki Kashou: "Well, there's a bench right over there. Let's rest for a bit."
Vanilla: "Then I'll go buy some drinks."
Minaduki Kashou: "Ah, thanks. Get enough for everyone."
Vanilla: "Got it. Leave it to me!"
He hands Vanilla some change and guides Chocola towards the bench.
The strong sea breeze rustles through the park's trees.

行く先がちょっとだけ不安になりながらも。
二匹の頭を愛情を込めてくしゃくしゃと撫でつける。
[嘉祥]: 「よし、じゃあ商店街に戻るか」

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「From here on out, we need to do our best all together.」
[Chocola]: 「Of course! ♪ Chocola is all right even if we don't have fatty tuna for dinner every night! Just occasionally is good enough!」
[Vanilla]: 「For meat, A4 grade is fine as long as it's Matsuzaka beef. Fatty meat is the best!」
[Kashou]: 「... Is that all you guys have been eating at home?!」
Even if the road ahead of us is uncertain...
I lovingly rubbed their heads, disheveling their hair.
[Kashou]: 「All right, why don't we head back to the shopping district then?」
[Chocola]: 「Eh? Why is that? Aren't you done with shopping already?」
[Kashou]: 「We have to go buy that shampoo you guys liked, don't we?」
[Vanilla]: 「Ohhh~ Master is so cool!」
[Vanilla]: 「While we're at it, let's buy some Matsuzaka beef.」

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Cinnamon, Coconut, I'm sorry to have worried you guys, too.」
[Kashou]: 「It won't happen again, so please cut me some slack.」
I lowered my head towards Cinnamon and Coconut.
And just like that, all the catgirls in my family were assembled.
I appreciated the warmth of having my family here right now.

[Shigure]: 「It was nothing.」
[Shigure]: 「I will always come and visit you, Nii-sama. I'll be cheering you on.」
She wrapped her small hands around my hand.
She didn't say anything about me slipping out without telling anyone.
She simply just forgave me.

[Kashou]: "I promise I won't do anything like this again, so please forgive me."
He bows his head to both Cinnamon and Coconut.
Having all the cats from my family home come here...
I truly appreciate the warmth of family now.

[Kashou]: "Ah, thank you. I'm sorry for causing you so much trouble."
[Shigure]: "It's nothing at all."
[Shigure]: "I've always watched over you, Brother, and I'll continue to support you."
She gently wraps my hand in her small hands.
Without uttering a single word about me leaving silently.
Just forgiving me.

I looked through the window onto the bakery floor and saw that the customer traffic had calmed down a bit.
Glancing at the clock, I saw that it was almost 3 PM.
... It seemed that selling out and closing early on opening day actually got us noticed.
Thanks to some tweets and blog posts, word of mouth had spread and we were really busy the next day.
You could argue that it was just a big coincidence, but this was definitely all because of Shigure.

[Kashou]: 「That they're not just pets, but family. Lovers, even.」
[Kashou]: 「So I didn't want them to have to work hard because of my choice to leave home.」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "...You said just now that you don't even realize when you're too tired, right?"
[Shigure]: "I should have noticed before it got to that point. Don't change the subject."
She straightens her posture and fixes me with a serious gaze.
Even as silence stretches out, she doesn't budge, continuing to stare at me.
Defeated by her persistence, I sigh and give in.
[Kashou]: "...It's because I thought I had to do my best."
I murmur towards the ceiling as I rest my head on the pillow.
[Kashou]: "The other day, I went on a date with Chocola and Vanilla."
[Kashou]: "And that's when it hit me."
[Kashou]: "They're not just pets anymore; they're family, even lovers."
[Kashou]: "So, I don't want them to suffer too much because I suddenly showed up."  

(Note: Preserved honorifics and onomatopoeia were not present in the original script, so none were added. Dialogue format and lack of commentary were strictly followed.)

metadata:
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「時雨のお陰様で、予想以上に客足が伸びたこともあるけどな」
[時雨]: 「あら何のことでしょう？」
俺がそれ以上は追求しないことにすると、
時雨も小さく笑って首を傾げて応える。
素直に答えるくらいなら直接言ってるだろうし。
そんなところも昔からの時雨らしさだ。
[時雨]: 「兄さまの仰ることも分かりますが」
[時雨]: 「でもネコは賢い子たちですから。人間の家族にも、パートナーにもなれるくらいに」
[時雨]: 「……だからこそ」
そこで一呼吸を置いて。
困ったような笑顔を浮かべて俺を見る。
[時雨]: 「……自分にも頼ってもらえないのは、きっと寂しいことだと思いますよ？」
その笑顔に胸がズキリと痛む。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well, it's your own fault our clientele increased so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh? Just what might you be talking about?」
I decided not to press further.
Shigure smiled slightly and tilted her head in response.
If she was going to address that issue honestly, she would already have done so by now.
That's how Shigure had always been.
[Shigure]: 「I understand what you are saying, Nii-sama...」
[Shigure]: 「... but catgirls are clever. Clever enough to become family, and even lovers, to humans.」
[Shigure]: 「... And that's exactly why.」
She took a deep breath...
... and looked at me with a kind of troubled smile.
[Shigure]: 「... I think there would be a feeling of sadness to not be relied upon.」
Her smile stabbed at my heart.
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "Thanks to Shigure, we've had more customers than expected at times."
[Shigure]: "Oh my, what could you mean?"
When I decided not to press the matter further,
Shigure responded with a small laugh and a tilt of her head.
If she were going to answer honestly, she would have said so directly.
That's just like Shigure has always been.
[Shigure]: "I understand what Brother is saying,"
[Shigure]: "But cats are intelligent creatures. They can be part of a human family or even partners."
[Shigure]: "…That’s precisely why…"
She paused for a moment,
Then gave me a troubled smile.
[Shigure]: "…Surely it must be lonely not being relied upon?"
Her smile caused a sharp pain in my chest.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
携帯の画面を見て眉根を寄せる。
そのまま動かない時雨を見て着信元を察する。
[嘉祥]: 「実家からだろ？　早く出ないと」
[時雨]: 「……用件など出ずとも分かります。行き先を告げずに出て来たので」
時雨の手の中の携帯が鳴り止む。
同じように時雨も黙ったまま、
携帯をぎゅっと握り締める。
[時雨]: 「……私がまだ年端もいかぬ女だからですか？」
[時雨]: 「それとも、世間知らずの子どもだからですか？」
[時雨]: 「……だから、私はお父さまとお母さまの言うことに従わねばならないのでしょうか」
[時雨]: 「……私は、ここにいたいのです」
[時雨]: 「兄さまが苦しまれてる時くらい……せめて、お傍にいるだけでも……」
reference_answer:
She looked at her phone and furrowed her brows.
When Shigure just sat there motionlessly, I could pretty much figure out who it was.
[Kashou]: 「It's from home, right? You should answer.」
[Shigure]: 「... I don't need to answer to know what they want. I left without saying where I was going.」
The cell phone in Shigure's hand stopped ringing.
Shigure fell silent...
... and gripped the cell phone tightly.
[Shigure]: 「... Is it because I'm still a young girl?」
[Shigure]: 「... Or is it because I'm naïve to the world?」
[Shigure]: 「... Is that why I must do what mother and father ask of me?」
[Shigure]: 「... I want to be here.」
[Shigure]: 「When Nii-sama is suffering... at the very least, let me be by his side...」
ModelAnswer:
MINADUKI SHIGURE: (Frowning at her phone screen.)
[KASHOU]: "It's from your family, isn't it? You should answer it."
MINADUKI SHIGURE: "…I know what they want without them even saying it. Because I left without telling them where I was going."
(Shigure’s phone stops ringing.)
(Shigure remains silent, gripping her phone tightly.)
MINADUKI SHIGURE: "…Is it because I'm still a young woman?"
MINADUKI SHIGURE: "Or is it because I'm an ignorant child?"
MINADUKI SHIGURE: "…So, I have to obey everything Father and Mother say?"
MINADUKI SHIGURE: "…I want to be here."
MINADUKI SHIGURE: "At least when Brother is suffering… at least let me stay by his side."  

(Note: Preserved honorifics like "Father" and "Mother" for 父さま/母さま, and maintained the dialogue format strictly as requested.)

metadata:
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[element] Name: Bell (鈴) | Type: Accessory
Question:
[バニラ]: 「他の病院の場所は知らないし……道を聞ける人も、歩いてない……」
[バニラ]: 「でも、このまま帰るわけにも行かないし……どうしたら……」
不安でぎゅっと手を握り合う。
冷たいシャッターを見上げて下唇をきゅっと噛む。
[警察]: 「キミたち、何してるの？」
[ショコラ]: 「あ……警察さん！」
[ショコラ]: 「開いてる病院教えてもらえませんか！？」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまが大変で！　それで、お医者さん呼ぼうと思って！」
[バニラ]: 「病院が休みで、どうすればいいか分からなくて……」
[警察]: 「飼い主さんが？　それは大変だけど……」
[警察]: 「キミたち鈴は？　持ってないの？」
[ショコラ＆バニラ]: 「あっ……！」
指摘されて首元に手を当てる。
reference_answer:
[Vanilla]: 「We don't know any other clinics... and there aren't any people on the street to ask.」
[Vanilla]: 「We can't just go back like this... What should we...」
We gripped each other's hands tightly in worry.
Looking up at the cold shutters, we chewed our lips in concern.
[Police Officer]: 「What are you two doing there?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah... Ms. Policewoman!」
[Chocola]: 「Where's the closest open clinic?!」
[Chocola]: 「Master is in trouble, so we wanted to get a doctor!」
[Vanilla]: 「The clinic is closed and we don't know what to do...」
[Police Officer]: 「Your Master is? That's a quite a problem, but...」
[Police Officer]: 「Where are your Bells? Don't you have them?」
[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「Ah...!」
We touched our necks where she pointed.
ModelAnswer:
VANILLA: "I don't know where any other hospitals are… and there's no one to ask for directions…"
VANILLA: "But I can't just go home like this… what should I do…?"
They grip each other's hands tightly, filled with anxiety.
They look up at the cold shutters, biting their lower lips.
POLICE OFFICER: "Hey, what are you two doing?"
CHOCOLA: "Ah… Officer!"
CHOCOLA: "Can you tell us where a hospital that's open is!?"
CHOCOLA: "It's an emergency with Master! We were going to call a doctor!"
VANILLA: "The hospitals are closed, and we don't know what to do…"
POLICE OFFICER: "Your owner? That sounds serious…"
POLICE OFFICER: "Don't you two have bells? You're not wearing them?"
CHOCOLA & VANILLA: "Ah…!"
They touch their necks after being reminded.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
朝イチから予想外の光景に頭がついて来てくれない。
[時雨]: 「おはようございます、兄さま」
[時雨]: 「私は今回の一件で色々と考えたのです」
晴れ晴れとした曇りの無い笑顔。
他のネコたちも同じように笑顔を俺に向けている。
つう、と冷たい汗が伝うのを感じながら、
[嘉祥]: 「はぁ……考えたって、何を……？」
何とかそれだけを口にする。
[時雨]: 「今回の一件で、兄さまに無理をするなというのが無理なことがよく分かりました」
[時雨]: 「ですが、私も妹として夜も眠れぬほど心配をさせられたのもまた事実……」
[時雨]: 「ならば人員を増やして、兄さまの負担を減らすのが一番の得策と、時雨は考えたのです」
[嘉祥]: 「…………はぁ」
reference_answer:
The first thing I saw this morning was so unexpected, my brain couldn't process it all.
[Shigure]: 「Good morning, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「This recent incident has gotten me thinking...」
She wore a sunny smile that no cloud could cover up.
The catgirls looked at me with similar smiles.
I felt myself break out in a cold sweat...
[Kashou]: 「Haah... thinking... about what...?」
I only managed to get out that much.
[Shigure]: 「After that incident, I learned that there's no way to keep Nii-sama from attempting to achieve the impossible.」
[Shigure]: 「However, it's also a fact that his dear little sister -- namely me -- is losing sleep from worrying about him so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Then, I thought that maybe having more workers would lessen Nii-sama's burden. That was the best plan.」
[Kashou]: 「...... Huh.」
ModelAnswer:
Morning came, and my brain couldn't process the unexpected sight before me.
[Shigure]: "Good morning, Brother."
[Shigure]: "I've given this whole situation a lot of thought."
A clear, cloudless smile.
The other cats are all giving me similar smiles.
Feeling a trickle of cold sweat run down my back,
[Kashou]: "Haa… Thought about what…?"
I somehow managed to get those words out.
[Shigure]: "This whole thing made it very clear that telling you not to push yourself is impossible."
[Shigure]: "But, as your sister, the fact remains that I was worried sick and couldn't sleep at night…"
[Shigure]: "Therefore, Shigure thought that increasing the workforce to reduce Brother's burden would be the most effective solution."
[Kashou]: "…………Haa."  

(Note: "Brother" is used for 兄さま (ani-sama) to maintain the familial honorific. "Haa" is kept as is, as it conveys a sigh in this context.)

Question:

[嘉祥]: 「いやいやいや」
[嘉祥]: 「だってお前門限あるし、平日は学校だってあるんだから……」
[時雨]: 「はい。ですので私一人ではなく、ネコたちが協力してくれるそうですから」
時雨がネコたちへと振り返る。
[ココナツ]: 「嘉祥さまのため、時雨さまの命とあれば」
[メイプル]: 「しょーがないわね、時雨がお小遣いくらいは出してくれるんでしょ？」
[アズキ]: 「ったく。めんどくせーけど飼いネコのつれーとこだよなぁ」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「No need to worry, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「If it's for Nii-sama, I don't need any pay.」
[Kashou]: 「No no no no.」
[Kashou]: 「You have a curfew, and on weekdays, you have school...!」
[Shigure]: 「Yes, that's why it's not just me. The catgirls will be helping, too.」
Shigure turned towards them all.
[Coconut]: 「If Shigure-sama orders are so, I'll work for Kashou-sama.」
[Maple]: 「I guess it can't be helped, then. At least Shigure will give me some allowance, right?」
[Azuki]: 「Geez. It's a pain in the butt, but that's the life of an owned catgirl, I guess.」
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "There's no need to worry, Onii-sama."
[Shigure]: "If it's for you, Onii-sama, I wouldn't need a salary at all."
[Kashou]: "No, no, no, no."
[Kashou]: "You have a curfew, and you're in school on weekdays…"
[Shigure]: "Yes. That's why the NEKO-tachi will be helping me, not just me alone."
Shigure turns to look at the NEKO-tachi.
[Coconut]: "For Kashou-sama, if Shigure-sama commands it."
[Maple]: "Guess I have no choice, as long as Shigure's paying us some allowance, right?"
[Azuki]: "Jeez. What a pain, but gotta support our keeper, huh?"  

(Note: "NEKO-tachi" is left in all-caps to preserve the stylistic emphasis from the original script, likely referring to the NEKO characters as a group.)

[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
Question:

[バニラ]: 「ふふ……」
[ショコラ]: 「にゃー、ご主人さまとバニラが、仲よさそうに話してる！」
[ショコラ]: 「ショコラも混ぜてくださいー！」
[バニラ]: 「べつに……注文を伝えてただけ」
[嘉祥]: 「仕事中だぞ、ショコラ」
[ショコラ]: 「ぎにゃー！？」
[嘉祥]: 「おしゃべりなら、あとで、ゆっくりな」
[バニラ]: 「行こう、ショコラ」
reference_answer:
[Vanilla]: 「Nice timing. You're always so on point, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「Vanilla, did you have a chat with those customers? They have some pretty happy smiles on their faces.」
[Vanilla]: 「...Mm.」
[Vanilla]: 「They said that me and Chocola get along really well.」
[Kashou]: 「Hahah... Guess they can pick up on that just from one look.」
[Vanilla]: 「Tee hee...」
[Chocola]: 「Meow! Master and Vanilla are having a fun conversation without Chocola!」
[Chocola]: 「You should let Chocola join in, too!」
[Vanilla]: 「Not really... I was just relaying the orders I took.」
[Kashou]: 「We're on the clock, Chocola.」
[Chocola]: 「Grk-nya?!」
[Kashou]: 「We can have a nice, long chat later, okay?」
[Vanilla]: 「Let's get going, Chocola.」
ModelAnswer:
VANILLA: "Perfect timing. As expected of you, Master. Never miss."
KASHOU: "Vanilla, were you talking to someone? The customer seemed to be laughing happily."
VANILLA: "...Hm."
VANILLA: "Chocola and I are very good friends."
KASHOU: "Heh... even a stranger can tell just by looking at you."
VANILLA: "Fufu..."
CHOCOLA: "Nyaa, Master and Vanilla are talking so happily!"
CHOCOLA: "Include Chocola too!"
VANILLA: "I was just... relaying the order."
KASHOU: "We're working, Chocola."
CHOCOLA: "Ginyah!?"
KASHOU: "If you want to chat, do it later when you have more time."
VANILLA: "Let's go, Chocola."  

(Note: "ぎにゃー！？" is transliterated as "Ginyah!?" for the onomatopoeia and emotional tone.)

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)

Question:
[バニラ]: 「ん？　ショコラ、その手の中のメモは、なに？」
[ショコラ]: 「あっ、そうだにゃ！」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さま、お誕生日ケーキの注文、いただきました！」
[嘉祥]: 「お、そいつは嬉しいな」
[バニラ]: 「……誕生日は、誰にとっても特別なもの。その１年に１回の記念日に、ソレイユのケーキを選んでもらえたのは、とっても光栄なこと」
[ショコラ]: 「そう言ってましたもんね、ご主人さま！」
[嘉祥]: 「うん。ちゃんと名前と年齢と連絡先、書いてもらったか？」
[ショコラ]: 「はい！　今回はバッチリです！」
[ショコラ]: 「種類とサイズも、しっかり聞いてあります！」
[嘉祥]: 「メッセージは○○くん、お誕生日おめでとう！でいいのかな？」
[ショコラ]: 「えーっと……」
reference_answer:
[Vanilla]: 「Hm? Chocola, what's that note in your hand?」
[Chocola]: 「Oh, that's ryght!」
[Chocola]: 「Master, we have an order for a birthday cake!」
[Kashou]: 「Ooh, that's good news.」
[Vanilla]: 「...Birthdays are a special time for everyone. It is a great honor for someone to select a cake from La Soleil for their once-a-year celebration.」
[Chocola]: 「Yep, you've said that in the past, right, Master?!」
[Kashou]: 「Sure have. So, did you make sure to get their name, age, and contact info?」
[Chocola]: 「Yes! All here, perfectly, this time!」
[Chocola]: 「Chocola even asked them the type and size they wanted, too!」
[Kashou]: 「What about the message? Will just 'Happy Birthday 〇〇-kun!' do?」
[Chocola]: 「Um, well...」
ModelAnswer:
[Vanilla]: "Hmm? Chocola, what's that memo in your hand?"
[Chocola]: "Ah, that's right!"
[Chocola]: "Master, we've received the order for the birthday cake!"
[Kashou]: "Oh, that makes me happy."
[Vanilla]: "...Birthdays are special for everyone. It's a great honor that you chose La Soleil's cake for this once-a-year celebration."
[Chocola]: "You said that too, Master!"
[Kashou]: "Yeah. Did you make sure to get their name, age, and contact information?"
[Chocola]: "Yes! I got it all this time!"
[Chocola]: "I also confirmed the type and size!"
[Kashou]: "Is 'Happy birthday, ○○-kun!' a good enough message?"
[Chocola]: "Let me see..."  

(Note: ○○-kun is left as is to preserve the original's placeholder for a name.)

Question:

[嘉祥]: 「そいつはよかった」

[嘉祥]: 「はは。時雨に用意してもらって正解だったよ」
reference_answer:

[Vanilla]: 「I think making an entry form would be a good idea after all. I'll spruce one up later, okay?」

[Kashou]: 「By the way, how are the winter clothes treating you? It's not too hot or anything indoors for you, is it?」
[Vanilla]: 「I was comfortable enough walking around in summer clothes as well, but...」
[Vanilla]: 「Once the door is opened and the breeze comes in, I end up longing for the space heater.」
[Vanilla]: 「The winter clothes are warm. These are good. I'm grateful.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, that's good to hear.」

[Kashou]: 「Hahah. Then asking Shigure to prepare them was the right call.」

[Vanilla]: "We really should make a registration sheet. Should I prepare one later?"
[Kashou]: "Thanks, that would be a big help."
[Kashou]: "By the way, how's the winter uniform? Not too hot indoors?"
[Vanilla]: "Even in the summer uniform, I didn't notice it while walking around..."
[Vanilla]: "But when the door opened and the outside air came in, I started missing the heater."
[Vanilla]: "The winter uniform is warm. This is good. Gratitude."
[Kashou]: "That's good to hear."
[Chocola]: "Chocola's back! The winter uniform is so cute, it's perfect, Master!"
[Kashou]: "Heh heh. I was right to have Shigure prepare it."

Question:
[アズキ]: 「そうみたいだな。丁寧に手で磨かないと、すぐ傷がついちまう」
１個１個、布に当てて、表面の毛を落としていく。

茎も丁寧に取らないと、えぐれて穴が開くと見栄えが悪い。
[シナモン]: 「はぁ……はぁ……美味しそう……」
[アズキ]: 「つまみ食いするなよ？　どんなにイチゴが美味しそうでも、絶対につまみ食いするなよ？」
[シナモン]: 「ああ～ん、イチゴ、つやつや～♪」

Question:
[メイプル]: 「紅茶は紅茶なんだけど……まぁ、オータムナルだものね」
[ココナツ]: 「おーたむ？」
[メイプル]: 「秋口に摘まれる茶葉をオータムナルといって、茶葉の風味が最も強く出るの」
[メイプル]: 「だから、ココナツの感想も、気持ちはわかるというか。言わんとすることは、伝わってくるというか。間違ってはいないわね」
[ココナツ]: 「へー、すごく美味しいよ！」
[メイプル]: 「それは、よかったわ」
[嘉祥]: 「俺もいいと思う。さっそく、メニューに加えてみようか」
[メイプル]: 「わかったわ、やっておくわね」
[メイプル]: 「あ、嘉祥、さっき電話があって……また大量注文が来ているけど？」
[嘉祥]: 「お、いつだい？」
[メイプル]: 「次の次の週末だから、まだ先になるわね」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「Black tea is what it is... but I suppose that's an Autumnal for you.」
[Coconut]: 「Autumn-wha?」
[Maple]: 「Tea leaves picked at the beginning of fall are called Autumnals, and they tend to draw the strongest flavors.」
[Maple]: 「What I mean is, I get where you're coming from in your impression—or I get what it is you're trying to say. Basically, you're not wrong.」
[Coconut]: 「Wow, this is so tasty!」
[Maple]: 「I'm glad you think so.」
[Kashou]: 「I think it's good, too. Would you mind putting it on the menu right away?」
[Maple]: 「All right, I'll get right on that.」
[Maple]: 「Oh, Kashou, there was a phone call earlier. We've got another bulk order.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh yeah? When?」
[Maple]: 「Two weekends from now. Still a ways to go.」
ModelAnswer:
[Maple]: "The tea is definitely tea... well, it's autumnal, after all."
[Coconut]: "Autumnal?"
[Maple]: "Tea leaves harvested early in the fall are called 'autumnal,' and that's when their flavor is strongest."
[Maple]: "So, I kind of understand what you mean, Coconut. Your point comes across. You're not wrong."
[Coconut]: "Wow, it's super delicious!"
[Maple]: "I'm glad to hear that."
[Kashou]: "I think it's great too. Should we add it to the menu right away?"
[Maple]: "Got it, I'll take care of it."
[Maple]: "Oh, Kashou, I got a call earlier... there's another large order coming in?"
[Kashou]: "Oh? When is it for?"
[Maple]: "The weekend after next, so still a ways off."  

(Note: "嘉祥" is transliterated as "Kashou" based on common practice. The honorific "ご主人さま" is translated as "Master," but since the character's name is given as Minaduki Kashou, I used his full name in the translation.)

Question:
たしかに、ショコラとバニラが来てくれず、時雨が他のネコたちを連れてこなかったら……
[メイプル]: 「たまには、あたしたちを労ってくれても、いいのよ？」
[ココナツ]: 「ねぎらう……って？　なにするの、メイプル？」
[メイプル]: 「そうねえ、ショコラとバニラだけじゃなく、あたしのことも……」
[メイプル]: 「って、なに言わせるのよ、ココナツ！？」
[ココナツ]: 「ぼく、何か変なこと言った！？」
[メイプル]: 「あ、あたしは、ただ……ネコたちを大切にしてほしい、って言ってるのよ」
[嘉祥]: 「うん……そうだな」
たしかに、メイプルの言うとおりだ。感謝するという言葉ばかりでは、申し訳ない。
[嘉祥]: 「今すぐは無理そうだけど……考えておくよ」
reference_answer:
She's right in that if Chocola and Vanilla didn't come and Shigure didn't bring the other girls here, then...
[Maple]: 「It wouldn't hurt you to reward us every once in a while, you know?」
[Coconut]: 「Reward...? By doing what, Maple?」
[Maple]: 「Right, maybe if he tended to us and not just Chocola and Vanilla, then...」
[Maple]: 「Wait, what are you making me say, Coconut?!」
[Coconut]: 「Did I say something off?!」
[Maple]: 「I-I'm just saying that... I want him to give his catgirls some care; that's all.」
[Kashou]: 「Right... I hear you.」
Maple is right. Just saying 'thanks' all the time is hardly good enough.
[Kashou]: 「I don't think I can do anything right this instant, but... I'll come up with something.」
ModelAnswer:
Certainly, if Chocola and Vanilla hadn't come, and Shigure hadn't brought the other cats...
[Maple]: "Sometimes, you could show us some appreciation, you know?"
[Coconut]: "Appreciate...? What are you going to do, Maple?"
[Maple]: "Well, not just Chocola and Vanilla, but me too..."
[Maple]: "Hey! Why are you making me say all this, Coconut!?"
[Coconut]: "Did I say something weird!?"
[Maple]: "I-I'm just saying... I want you to cherish the cats."
[Kashou]: "Yeah... that's true."
Certainly, Maple is right. It feels wrong to only express gratitude with words.
[Kashou]: "It might not be possible right away, but... I'll think about it."  

(Note: Preserved honorifics and onomatopoeia are not applicable in this script, so the translation focuses on natural dialogue formatting and accuracy.)

reference_answer:

[Maple]: 「Welcome to La Soleil. Huh?」
[Coconut]: 「Welcome!! Oh...?」
[Shigure]: 「A good morning to you, my beloved brother. And thank you, everyone else.」
[Chocola]: 「It's Shigure-chan, nya!」
[Kashou]: 「Heya, Shigure. Something up today?」

[Shigure]: 「If I do not see your face once a day, I will start to develop withdrawal symptoms.」

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「……半分は本気なのか」
[時雨]: 「今日は、兄様に頼みたいことがあって来たのですよ」
時雨は、ささっと店内に視線を巡らせた。
[時雨]: 「……この依頼は、どうか内密に……もちろん、お代は言い値で支払わせていただきます」
[嘉祥]: 「不穏すぎる。この平和なパティスリーで、何を頼む気だ？」
[時雨]: 「それはですね――」
[時雨]: 「それはですね――」
[時雨]: 「母様のお誕生日ケーキを頼みたいのです！」
[嘉祥]: 「な、なんだってー！？」
[ショコラ]: 「にゃんですとー！？」
[バニラ]: 「お誕生日ケーキ！？」
[アズキ]: 「おいおい、時雨……マジかよ……」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「...Meaning the other half is serious?」
[Shigure]: 「I've come here today because I have a request to ask of you, Nii-sama.」
Shigure takes a quick scan of the inside of the shop.
[Shigure]: 「...I would like if you were to keep this request between us. Of course, I am willing to pay you full asking price for your services.」
[Kashou]: 「This sounds way too sketchy. What exactly are you trying to request of my peaceful patisserie?」
[Shigure]: 「Well, you see...」
[Shigure]: 「Well, you see...」
[Shigure]: 「I would like to request you make Mother's birthday cake!」
[Kashou]: 「Wh-What did you say?!」
[Chocola]: 「Meowhat?!」
[Vanilla]: 「Birthday cake?!」
[Azuki]: 「Hey, come on, Shigure... Are you serious...?」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "...Is half of that serious?"
[Shigure]: "I came today because I have a favor to ask of you, Brother."
Shigure quickly scanned the shop.
[Shigure]: "...This request is strictly confidential... Of course, I'll pay any price you ask."
[Kashou]: "That's ominous. What could you possibly want in this peaceful patisserie?"
[Shigure]: "Well, it's—"
[Shigure]: "Well, it's—"
[Shigure]: "I'd like to order a birthday cake for Mother!"
[Kashou]: "W-What did you say?!"
[Chocola]: "Nyan did you say?!"
[Vanilla]: "A birthday cake?!"
[Azuki]: "Seriously, Shigure... are you for real?"  

(Note: "にゃんですとー！？" is a playful/affected way of saying "What was that?", mimicking Chocola's cat-like personality. The translation reflects this with "Nyan did you say?!" while preserving the original's tone.)

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
あえて話すようなことじゃない、と思っていただけで、隠しておく理由はなかった。
ちょうど客足は落ちついているし、店内のほうも注文された品は出し終え、お客さんたちは穏やかにお茶を楽しんでいた。
いつもなら、交代で休憩を取る時間帯だ。
[嘉祥]: 「……親父は……俺に和菓子屋を継がせるつもりだった、と思う。今はわからないが……」
[嘉祥]: 「いろいろ教えこまれたよ……味を覚えるように、って言われて、さまざまな物を口に入れてみたり」
[嘉祥]: 「料理の基礎を教えてくれたのも、親父だ」
[嘉祥]: 「すごく大変だったし、反感を覚えたこともあったけど……」
[嘉祥]: 「今では、どれも役に立ってて、感謝してる」
[嘉祥]: 「でも、俺は……まるで決まっていたことのように、和菓子屋を継ぐことに……抵抗があったんだ」
reference_answer:
I had simply thought that this wasn't the sort of thing I'd go out of my way to talk about; it wasn't because I was trying to hide it from anyone.
The rush of customers has finally died down, and we're done bringing out the customers' orders. They're all sitting, quietly enjoying their tea and cake.
Normally, this would be the part in the day where the girls would be swapping in for breaks.
[Kashou]: 「You see... Dad was planning on making me run the family business. Or, so I thought. I'm not too sure about now.」
[Kashou]: 「Still, he drilled a lot of lessons into me... He would tell me to learn the flavor of each thing he had me taste.」
[Kashou]: 「Dad was also the one who taught me the basics of culinary arts.」
[Kashou]: 「It was a tough process, and I did harbor some resentment over it all, but...」
[Kashou]: 「Nowadays, I'm grateful that all of that ended up being useful.」
[Kashou]: 「But, I was opposed... to me running the family business as if it were already set in stone.」
ModelAnswer:
It wasn't something I intentionally hid, just not something I thought needed to be spoken about. There was no real reason to keep it secret.
The customer flow had calmed down, and all the ordered items were out in the shop; the customers were peacefully enjoying their tea.
This would usually be the time for us to take turns on break.
[Kashou]: "…My father… I think he intended for me to inherit the wagashi shop. I don't know anymore, though…"
[Kashou]: "He taught me so many things… He told me to memorize flavors and had me try all sorts of things."
[Kashou]: "He also taught me the basics of cooking."
[Kashou]: "It was incredibly difficult at times, and I even resented it sometimes…"
[Kashou]: "But now, everything he taught me is useful, and I'm grateful for it."
[Kashou]: "Still, I felt a resistance to inheriting the wagashi shop… as if it were already decided."  

(Note: "Wagashi" is a traditional Japanese confectionery, often served with tea. The honorific "-san" is omitted in the translation as per the instruction to preserve only dialogue format and no commentary.)

[時雨]: 「わかります、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「でしょう？」
reference_answer:
I've certainly gotten compliments from customers before, but getting one from my own mother is making me blush, oddly enough.
All of the catgirls have their eyes alight.
[Chocola]: 「That is so lovely, Master~!」
[Vanilla]: 「Very good.」

[Shigure]: 「I know how you feel, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「Right?」

"Getting compliments from customers is one thing, but hearing it from my mother makes me strangely embarrassed."
The cats' eyes sparkled.
Chocola: "It's so beautiful, Master~!"
Vanilla: "Good."

Maple: "You really put your heart into it."

Coconut: "Amazing... so cute. It's almost a shame to eat!"
Awayuki: "Really. It feels like a waste to cut it."
Awayuki: "I almost want to display it in my room forever."
Shigure: "I know what you mean, Mother!"
Awayuki: "Right?"

Question:

[メイプル]: 「さくさくさく、っと」
メイプルがケーキに包丁を入れ、手早く切り分けていく。
[淡雪]: 「あらー……」
[淡雪]: 「なんだか、ネコたちも、ずいぶん手慣れたわね。包丁の扱いがプロみたいだわ」

[淡雪]: 「あら、そうよね！　うふふ……頼もしいわね」

[時雨]: 「えっ！？」

reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「We won't be able to eat it if it spoils, so... it has to get cut.」
[Shigure]: 「You're right. It's a necessary evil. Please, do the deed, Maple.」
[Maple]: 「All right, slice, slice, slice.」
Maple puts the kitchen knife into the cake and quickly slices the cake into pieces.
[Awayuki]: 「Oh my...」
[Awayuki]: 「Seems the catgirls have become quite skilled themselves. She's handling the knife like a professional.」
[Shigure]: 「They all work in the shop, so they are professionals, Mother.」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh my, that's right! Tee hee hee... Such reliable girls.」
Once the cake is all sliced up, that's when it happens—
From the foyer, the sound of the door opening echoes.
[Shigure]: 「Huh?!」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh, that sounds like your father opening the door. He must be back early today.」
ModelAnswer:

[SHIGURE]: "Yes, that's right. I suppose there's no helping it, Maple, please go ahead."
[MAPLE]: "Sakusaku-saku…"
Maple puts the knife into the cake and quickly begins cutting it into slices.
[AWAYUKI]: "Oh my…"
[AWAYUKI]: "The cats have really gotten used to this, haven't they? They handle those knives like professionals."
[SHIGURE]: "They work at a shop, Mother. They *are* professionals."
[AWAYUKI]: "Oh, that's right! Hehe… how reliable."
Just as the cake was finished being cut—
The sound of the front door opening came from the entrance.
[SHIGURE]: "Eh!?"
[AWAYUKI]: "Oh dear, that way of opening it is Father. Looks like he's home early today."

[ショコラ]: 「あの！　ご主人さまのお父さま、お帰りなさーい！」

reference_answer:
My body freezes up from the tension.
The catgirls are also taken aback.
[Suhama]: 「...Hmph.」
This man is my father, Suhama Minaduki.
[Shigure]: 「Um, Father... I thought you had a community chamber get-together to attend tonight...?」
[Suhama]: 「I did. Is there something wrong with me coming back home?」
[Shigure]: 「N-No, that isn't what I meant...」
[Chocola]: 「Um! Welcome back home, Master's Father!」
[Vanilla]: 「Master's Father, you have returned earlier than we anticipated.」
[Coconut]: 「F-Father, welcome back!」
[Suhama]: 「Mm-hmm.」
[Maple]: 「...Hey, isn't this bad news?」
ModelAnswer:
I stiffened, overwhelmed by tension.
The cats held their breath.

[Suhama]: "……Hmph."

This man is my father—Minaduki Suhama.

[Shigure]: "Um, Father… weren't you supposed to be at the Chamber of Commerce meeting tonight…?"

[Coconut]: "F-Father, welcome home!"

[Suhama]: "Hmm."

[Maple]: "……This is bad, isn't it?"

[Shigure]: "Oh, that's right! Father, please try Brother's cake today!"
[Shigure]: "If you taste it, you'll know how seriously he's dedicated himself to baking!"
I couldn't help but hold my breath. Would my father actually eat the cake I made?
What would he say?
[Chocola]: "I agree! If everyone eats Master's delicious cake, we'll all become friends, nya!"
[Vanilla]: "No doubt."
[Coconut]: "Yeah, yeah! Big brother's cake is seriously amazing!"

metadata:
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
俺は、それだけを告げると、水無月の家から出ていた。まるで逃げるように。
いろいろなことが頭の中で駆け巡り、思考がごちゃごちゃになった。
気がつけば、俺は夜の公園にいた。
[嘉祥]: 「あ……」
家の鍵もサイフも、全て鞄に入れて、置いてきてしまった。
[嘉祥]: 「……なにやってるんだ、俺は」
[ショコラ]: 「……ご主人さま」
[嘉祥]: 「ショコラ……！」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人、忘れ物」
バニラの手には、俺の鞄があった。
[嘉祥]: 「持ってきてくれたのか、バニラ」
[バニラ]: 「当然のこと。野宿は困る」
[嘉祥]: 「そりゃそうだな」
鍵がなかったら、俺だけでなく２匹も家に入れないところだ。
reference_answer:
That's all I say before leaving the Minaduki house. Almost as if I'm running away.
I have so many things running through my mind that my thoughts are a jumbled mess.
Before I realize it, I'm standing in the park in the middle of the night.
[Kashou]: 「Aah...」
I left my house keys, wallet, and everything else in my bag back at the house.
[Kashou]: 「...What am I even doing?」
[Chocola]: 「...Master.」
[Kashou]: 「Chocola...!」
[Vanilla]: 「You forgot this, Master.」
Vanilla is holding my bag.
[Kashou]: 「You fetched that for me, Vanilla?」
[Vanilla]: 「Naturally. We can't camp outside.」
[Kashou]: 「Good point.」
Without the key to the house, not only would I be locked out, but so would these two.
ModelAnswer:
I left Minaduki's house as soon as I said that, practically running away.
So many thoughts raced through my head, turning everything into a jumbled mess.
Before I knew it, I was in the park at night.

[Kashou]: "Ah..."
My house keys and wallet—everything was in my bag, which I'd left behind.

[Kashou]: "...What am I even doing?"

[Chocola]: "...Master..."

[Kashou]: "Chocola...!"

[Vanilla]: "Master, you forgot something."
Vanilla held my bag in her hands.

[Kashou]: "You brought it to me, Vanilla?"

[Vanilla]: "It's only natural. Sleeping outside would be troublesome."

[Kashou]: "Yeah, you're right."
Without the keys, I wouldn't have been able to get inside with both of them.

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「ショコラたちは大丈夫です！」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまは、大丈夫ですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ……もちろん」
[嘉祥]: 「……いや……どうかな？」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人、忘れ物を持ってきたご褒美はある？」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ？　何か欲しいのか？」
[バニラ]: 「あそこに自販機がある。温かい飲み物を買ってくる。今夜は冷える」
[嘉祥]: 「……わかった」
ご褒美と言ったが……バニラは、俺のために温かい飲み物を買ってきてくれるのだろう。
いつの間にか、ずいぶんと身体が冷えていた。
[バニラ]: 「どうぞ、ご主人」
[嘉祥]: 「ありがとうな、バニラ」
俺は買ってきてもらった缶コーヒーを受け取った。
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「Chocola and Vanilla are fine!」
[Chocola]: 「But are you okay, Master?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah... Of course.」
[Kashou]: 「...Actually... I'm not sure.」
[Vanilla]: 「Master, do I get a reward for retrieving your bag?」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Did you want something?」
[Vanilla]: 「There is a vending machine over there. I'll buy some warm drinks. Tonight is chilly.」
[Kashou]: 「...Sure.」
Vanilla's calling it a 'reward', but... she's going off to buy a warm drink for me and not the other way around.
I do feel pretty darn cold, now that I realize it, though.
[Vanilla]: 「Here you go, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「Hey, thanks, Vanilla.」
I take the can of coffee that Vanilla bought for me.
ModelAnswer:
CHOCOLA: "Chocola and I are fine!"
CHOCOLA: "Master, are you alright?"
KASHOU: "Ah... of course."
KASHOU: "...No... I wonder?"
VANILLA: "Master, is there a reward for bringing your forgotten item?"
KASHOU: "Huh? Do you want something?"
VANILLA: "There's a vending machine over there. I'll buy you a warm drink. It's cold tonight."
KASHOU: "...Got it."

*She said 'reward,' but... Vanilla is going to buy me a warm drink.*

Before I knew it, my body had gotten quite cold.

VANILLA: "Here you go, Master."
KASHOU: "Thanks, Vanilla."

I accepted the canned coffee she bought for me.  

(Note: The final line of narration was added for clarity and to maintain the flow of the scene, as it directly follows the action described in the previous lines.)

[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨]: 「ふふ……私は兄様を応援していますから」
[時雨]: 「ここで英気を養って、兄様が頑張ってくださる……その姿こそが、私の一番の幸福です」
[嘉祥]: 「そう言ってくれるのは、嬉しいけどな」
[時雨]: 「むしろ、私の生き甲斐。養分。必須栄養素。水と空気と太陽光なのです」
大袈裟な――と思ったが、俺は時雨の応援に甘えることにした。
チェックインを済ませ、部屋へ。
[時雨]: 「あの……どうですか、兄様？　おかしく、ありませんか？」
[嘉祥]: 「よく似合うよ、時雨。いつも和服だから、まったく違和感ない」
[時雨]: 「はう……そうですよね。嬉しいような、肩透かしのような……」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Hee hee... I am here to support you, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「Seeing you regain your energy here and working your hardest is the ultimate happiness for me.」
[Kashou]: 「I do appreciate you saying that, but still...」
[Shigure]: 「In fact, it is my purpose in life. My nourishment, my essential nutrients, my water, air, and sunlight.」
While I think she's exaggerating like crazy, I decide to take Shigure up on her support.
We finish checking in and head to our rooms.
[Shigure]: 「Um... How is it, Nii-sama? It doesn't look... odd, I hope?」
[Kashou]: 「It looks great on you, Shigure. You always wear Japanese clothes anyway, so there's not a single thing off about it.」
[Shigure]: 「Hngh... Yes, I suppose. Though, I'm not sure if that is a compliment or a deflection...」
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "Fufu… I'm cheering you on, Master."
[Shigure]: "Resting here and nurturing my strength while you work hard… that's what makes me happiest of all."
[Kashou]: "I appreciate you saying that, but still…"
[Shigure]: "Rather, it’s my reason for living. My nourishment. An essential nutrient. Like water, air, and sunlight."

*That's a bit much*—I thought, but I decided to indulge Shigure's support.
After checking in, we went to the room.

[Shigure]: "Um… how is it, Master? Does it look strange?"
[Kashou]: "It suits you well, Shigure. You usually wear kimono, so it doesn't feel out of place at all."
[Shigure]: "Hau… I see. It's a little bit happy and a little bit anticlimactic…"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
仕入れ先に頼みたいことがあった。急ぎではないが、早いうちに電話しておいたほうがいい。
個人経営のパティスリーなら普通のことだと思うが、俺は仕入れ先の一つ一つと自分で交渉をしている。
一般流通されていないような食材も、まとまった量を仕入れるなら、売ってくれる農家もある。
味の探究は、食材を探す旅でもあった。
皆が観光で盛り上がっているときに、仕事の話をするのも野暮なので、俺は私用があると言って、部屋を離れる。
念のために旅館からも出て、静かな場所で話すことにした。
電話をかける。
[嘉祥]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……」
国外からの注文ということで先方に驚かれたが、どうにか発送してくれそうだ。
俺は旅館の中へと戻る。
reference_answer:
There's something I wanna request from a supplier. It's no rush, but it's a good idea to give him a phone call as soon as possible.
I think it's pretty common for an independently-owned patisserie, but I negotiate with every single supplier on my own.
Even for ingredients not in circulation for the general public, if I need to replenish my supply of them in bulk, there are farmers who will buy it for me.
Researching flavors is also a journey to search for ingredients.
Since it'd be uncouth of me to talk about work when everyone is excited about sightseeing, I tell them that I have personal business to take care of and leave the room.
Just to be sure, I leave the inn and decide to talk someplace quieter.
I make my phone call.
[Kashou]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[Kashou]: 「Phew...」
I was met with surprise from the other person on the line since it was an order from overseas, but it seems they'll be putting in my order.
I return to the inn.
ModelAnswer:

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「どれ、１つ食べてみるか」
屋台で温泉まんじゅうを１つ買った。
できたて熱々だ。
かじってみると、ふっくらしていて、思っていたよりしっとりした食感だった。
舌のうえで、ほろほろと餡子が崩れて、甘味が広がる。
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど……ほふほふ……これは、美味しいな」
俺が作る洋菓子も、実家の和菓子も、温かいものを出すということはない。
熱々のまんじゅうを、ほふほふ言いながら食べるのは、これはこれで面白い体験だった。
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、温泉街には何度か来ているけれど……食べたことなかったな」
昔はネコたちがいなかったからだ。
両親と時雨と俺の４人で旅行しても、買い食いしようなんて話にはならなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well then, maybe I should have one.」
I buy a hot-spring manju bun from the stand.
It's freshly made and piping hot.
I take a bite into it, and my mouth is greeted by a fluffy and moist sensation.
Atop my tongue, the red bean paste starts to break down, and the sweetness starts to spread.
[Kashou]: 「Now I see... Fff, Fff... This is pretty good.」
Neither the Western sweets I make nor the Japanese sweets my family makes are ever served warm.
Eating a piping-hot manju bun while huffing to cool it down in my mouth is a pretty interesting experience in its own right.
[Kashou]: 「You know, I've been to the hot spring district plenty of times in the past, but... I never ate one of these before.」
Mostly because the catgirls weren't around back then.
Even when the four of us—my parents, Shigure, and I—traveled, buying local snacks and eating never came into the equation.
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "Alright, let's try one."
He bought a fresh-off-the-grill hot spring manju at the food stall.
It was piping hot.
Taking a bite, he found it fluffy and more moist than he'd expected.
The sweet red bean paste crumbled delicately on his tongue, spreading its sweetness.
[Kashou]: "I see... *hoo hoo*... this is delicious."
Neither the Western sweets I make nor the traditional Japanese sweets from my family's shop are served warm.
Eating a piping-hot manju while *hoo-hoo*-ing on it was a unique experience in itself.
[Kashou]: "Come to think of it, I've been to this hot spring town several times... but never eaten one before."
Back then, the cats weren't around.
Even when traveling with my parents and Shigure, the idea of grabbing street food never even came up.  

(Note: *Hoo hoo* is a Japanese onomatopoeia representing blowing on something hot to cool it down.)

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「やあ、ここに居たのか、時雨。もしかして用事？」
[時雨]: 「いいえ、もう大丈夫です」
[嘉祥]: 「もしかして、時雨も仕事の電話だったのかな？」
[時雨]: 「……は、はい。すみません。せっかくの旅行中に」
[嘉祥]: 「謝るようなことじゃないよ。ソレイユは定休日だけど、世間は平日なんだし」
詳しくは聞いていないが、時雨は会社を経営しているらしい。
その収入で、ネコたちの衣服を買ったり、鈴持ちの受験をさせたり。
父親は俺に対しては厳しいが、妹の時雨には甘い。ネコのことも商売のことも、自由にさせているようだった。
[嘉祥]: 「ネコたちは、思い思いに満喫してたよ。卓球とか、ゲームとか……売店とか」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Heya, so this is where you've been, Shigure? Did you need something?」
[Shigure]: 「No, I'm fine now.」
[Kashou]: 「Did you have to put in a call for work, too, by any chance?」
[Shigure]: 「...Y-Yes. I apologize for doing it in the middle of our vacation.」
[Kashou]: 「Nothing to apologize over. La Soleil may be on a regular holiday, but it is a weekday by normal standards.」
She never told me the specifics, but Shigure apparently runs a company.
With her income, she's able to buy the catgirls' clothes and allow them to take bell-holder exams, among other things.
My dad is harsh toward me, but he's soft toward my younger sister, Shigure. It seems that he is pretty liberal toward the catgirls and his business.
[Kashou]: 「The catgirls are enjoying themselves individually. Playing ping-pong, playing video games... buying from the concession stand.」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "Hey, Shigure, you were here. Did you need something?"
[Shigure]: "No, I'm all set now."
[Kashou]: "Was it a work call for you too, maybe?"
[Shigure]: "...Yes, sorry. Even though we're on vacation."
[Kashou]: "There's no need to apologize. La Soleil is closed today, but the world keeps turning."

*Though he hasn't asked for details, Shigure apparently runs a company. She uses that income to buy clothes for the cats and pay for Neko's exam fees. Her father is strict with him but lenient with his sister, Shigure. He seems to let her do as she pleases when it comes to both the cats and business.*

[Kashou]: "The cats were all enjoying themselves in their own ways—table tennis, games... even the souvenir shop."

[Shigure]: 「I've heard they have a karaoke room here.」
[Kashou]: 「Karaoke, eh? I only went a bit back in high school. Can you sing, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「I dabbled in chorus when I was a child.」
Sounds like a plan, then.
[Shigure]: 「Now then, this will be dedicated to you, Nii-sama...」
Once she starts singing, the mood gets turned on its head.
[Shigure]: 「~~~♪」
[Kashou]: 「...Amazing.」
[Shigure]: 「Hah~ It has been quite some time since I've exerted my voice like that.」
[Kashou]: 「You're REALLY good!」
To be frank, she's practically pro level. I give her generous applause.
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "That's good to hear... Brother, wouldn't you like to spend some quality sibling time together?"
[Kashou]: "Sure, but what should we do?"
[Shigure]: "Apparently there's a karaoke room available?"
[Kashou]: "Karaoke, huh... I haven't been since high school. Shigure, can you sing?"
[Shigure]: "I did choir as a child, so a little bit."

And that's how it came to be.
[Shigure]: "Now then, putting my feelings for you into this..."
The atmosphere completely changed as she began to sing.
[Shigure]: "～～～♪"
[Kashou]: "...Amazing."
[Shigure]: "Whew~, I haven't used my full voice in ages."
[Kashou]: "You're incredibly good!"
Frankly, she was on par with a professional. I gave her a resounding applause.

リストを探してみる。

reference_answer:

[Shigure]: 「To think that my singing could delight you so much... This voice... is in your memories... Hah, hah...」
[Shigure]: 「Urk... I feel a nosebleed coming on...」
[Kashou]: 「H-Hey, are you all right?」
[Shigure]: 「Unghh... If it is not too much to ask, would you sing a song next?」
[Kashou]: 「Urk... O-Okay, fine.」
The two of us are here to do some karaoke, so I very well can't NOT sing, huh? Though, going up after an excellent singer like Shigure does load on the pressure...
[Kashou]: 「Um, let's see... For newish songs, there's that one I learned back when I was studying abroad...」
I search the list.
[Kashou]: 「Huh? I can't find it... I thought it was more or less a hit song, too...」
ModelAnswer:

[Shigure]: "That my song could bring such joy to Onii-sama… this voice of mine… in Onii-sama’s memories… *hah, hah*…"
[Shigure]: "Ugh… a nosebleed…"
[Kashou]: "H-hey, are you alright?"
[Shigure]: "Uuu… if it pleases you, Onii-sama, perhaps you could sing next?"
[Kashou]: "Ugh… o-okay."

Coming to karaoke with her, I guess I can't *not* sing. It's going to be rough after Shigure's incredible performance, though…
[Kashou]: "Umm… for something newer, there’s that song I learned when I was studying abroad…"
*Searches through the list.*
[Kashou]: "Huh? I can't find it… I thought it was a moderately popular hit…?"  

(Note: "Onii-sama" is preserved as an honorific term for "older brother," and onomatopoeia like "hah, hah" are retained to reflect the original script's pacing.)

[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Coconut (ココナツ) | Gender: Female

Question:
[アズキ]: 「すー……すー……ふへへ……」
[ココナツ]: 「んにゃむちゃ……おねえひゃあん……それ、ぼくのおまんじゅー……むにゃ」
[時雨]: 「すー……すー……」
やはり、眠れそうにない。
俺は音を立てないように気をつけつつ、部屋を出た。
宿は常夜灯があるが、そこを離れると田舎の夜だ。
場所によっては、自分の足元さえわからないほどの暗闇が広がっている。
昼間は観光客で賑わっている温泉街も、深夜となると、すっかり雰囲気が違っている。
橋から下を眺める。
暗闇だ。
川の流れる水音だけがしていた。
川面に映った月が見えそう……いや、あれは街灯の光か？
確かめようと、俺は橋の下を覗きこんだ。
reference_answer:
[Azuki]: 「Zz... Zz... Heh heh...」
[Coconut]: 「Mm-nya mm-gh... Onee-hyaan... That's my manju... Mm-nya.」
[Shigure]: 「Zzz... Zzz...」
Yeah, I don't think I can get to sleep.
I exit the room, careful not to make a sound on the way out.
The inn has its lamps on at night, but once I leave the area, I'm greeted by rural darkness.
Depending on the spot, it's dark enough that I can't even tell where it is I'm standing.
This hot spring district is usually bustling with tourists during the day, but in the wee hours of the night, it has a completely different atmosphere.
I peer down from the bridge.
Darkness.
All I can hear is the sound of the running river.
I feel I can make out the moon's reflection on the water's surface... No, wait, is that just a street light?
I peer deeper below the bridge to confirm.
ModelAnswer:
[AZUKI]: "Snoo... snoo... heh heh..."
[COCONUT]: "Mmmm... sis-ter... that's my manjuu... mmmph..."
[SHIGURE]: "Snoo... snoo..."

Still, I didn't think I'd be able to sleep.
I carefully left the room, trying not to make any noise.
The inn had nightlights, but once you stepped away from them, it was pure countryside darkness.
In some places, it was so dark you couldn't even see your own feet.
The hot spring district, bustling with tourists during the day, felt completely different late at night.
I looked down from the bridge.
Darkness.
Only the sound of the river flowing could be heard.
It almost seemed like I could see the moon reflected on the water... or was that just the light from the streetlamp?
I leaned over the edge of the bridge to get a better look.

Question:
[アズキ]: 「外靴がなかったからな。普通じゃねーだろ、こんな夜中に？」
[嘉祥]: 「申し訳ない……本当に気分転換だったんだよ」
[アズキ]: 「悩みって、まだコンビニスイーツのことで？」
[嘉祥]: 「いやいや、さすがに、それはもう大丈夫だ」
[嘉祥]: 「ただ、今までのことを思い出して……自分には何が足りないのだろう、と考えてみたりさ」
[アズキ]: 「嘉祥の今までのことって？」
[嘉祥]: 「……大学卒業後に、俺はフランス留学をした」
[嘉祥]: 「卒業して、何の選択肢もなく家業を継ぐのが、どうにも釈然としなくて。自分の見識を広げたかったんだ」
[嘉祥]: 「勘違いしないでほしいんだけど……水無月の和菓子が嫌いなわけじゃないからな？」
reference_answer:
[Azuki]: 「Because you didn't put on outside shoes. That's not normal for a walk this late at night, don't you think?」
[Kashou]: 「Sorry... I really just needed to clear my head.」
[Azuki]: 「Are the convenience store sweets still what's buggin' you?」
[Kashou]: 「No, no. I'm good on that front now.」
[Kashou]: 「It's just that I've been thinking back on everything up till now... and I'm almost positive that there's something I'm still lacking.」
[Azuki]: 「What's 'everything up till now' for you, exactly?」
[Kashou]: 「...After I graduated college, I studied abroad in France.」
[Kashou]: 「Graduating and taking over the family business with no other options on the table wasn't satisfactory to me in the least. I wanted to broaden my horizons.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't want you to get the wrong impression, though... It's not like I hate the Minaduki's Japanese-style sweets, got it?」
ModelAnswer:
[AZUKI]: "Because I didn't have my outdoor shoes. Isn't that weird, at this hour?"
[KASHOU]: "I'm sorry… It was really just to clear my head."
[AZUKI]: "You're still worried about the convenience store sweets?"
[KASHOU]: "No, no, I think I'm past that now."
[KASHOU]: "It's just... remembering everything up until now... and wondering what I'm lacking, you know?"
[AZUKI]: "What about your past, Kashou?"
[KASHOU]: "...After graduating university, I studied abroad in France."
[KASHOU]: "Graduating and having no other options but to take over the family business just didn't sit right with me. I wanted to broaden my horizons."
[KASHOU]: "I don't want you to get the wrong idea... It's not like I dislike Minaduki's wagashi, okay?"  

(Note: "Wagashi" is a traditional Japanese confectionery.)

[Kashou]: 「In my mentor's shop, I ate those impressively delicious Western-style sweets and saw the smiles of the patrons there.」
[Kashou]: 「I thought to myself that this was exactly what I was in search of.」
[Azuki]: 「Something that wasn't in the Minaduki Japanese sweet shop?」

[Kashou]: 「Although, personally, I don't feel as though I've matched my mentor's distinct flavor in the slightest...」

[Azuki]: "Ah, that's right."
[Kashou]: "I begged my mentor to take me as his apprentice… and he taught me how to make Western sweets."
[Kashou]: "As my study abroad neared its end—my mentor told me he'd taught me everything."
[Kashou]: "But I felt like I hadn't even caught up to his skill at all…"

[Kashou]: "Just taste it without thinking about unnecessary things...?"  

*(Note: "Sho-chan" is a nickname for Chocola using the familiar "-chan" suffix.)*

metadata:
[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female

[character] Name: Azuki (アズキ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[メイプル]: 「か、嘉祥っ」
[嘉祥]: 「っと……」
俺は呼吸を整える。
危ない。皆の前で、声を荒らげるところだった。
[シナモン]: 「ドキドキ……」
[嘉祥]: 「メイプル、シナモン。まだ、残ってたのかい？」
もう店は閉店したと思ったのだが……
[メイプル]: 「レジが合わなかったわ。アズキは細かいこと気にすんなって言ってたけど」
[シナモン]: 「気になって～。わたしたちで数え直してたんです～」
売った物と、レジの中の金額が合わないことは、希にある。あまり多くては困るが……
[嘉祥]: 「幾ら合わなかったんだい？」
[メイプル]: 「１円」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「K-Kashou!」
[Kashou]: 「Huh...?」
I take a breath to regain my composure.
Close call. I almost started shouting in front of everyone.
[Cinnamon]: 「Be still, my heart...」
[Kashou]: 「Maple, Cinnamon? You guys are still here?」
I thought that the shop would be closed by now, but here they are...
[Maple]: 「The register count didn't add up. Azuki said 'not to sweat such a small matter', but...」
[Cinnamon]: 「We couldn't help ourselves~ So the two of us recounted it~」
It's rare that our sold stock doesn't add up with the money in the register. If it's too much of a difference, it could be a problem, but...
[Kashou]: 「How much didn't add up?」
[Maple]: 「One yen.」
ModelAnswer:
[Maple]: "K-Kashou!"
[Kashou]: "Whoa..."
I steady my breathing.
That was close. Almost raised my voice in front of everyone.
[Cinnamon]: "Doki doki..."
[Kashou]: "Maple, Cinnamon. You two were still here?"
I thought the shop had closed already...
[Maple]: "The register was off. Azuki said not to sweat the small stuff, but..."
[Cinnamon]: "It bothered me~! We were recounting it ourselves~!"
Discrepancies between sales and the cash in the register happen rarely. Too many would be a problem, though...
[Kashou]: "How much was it off by?"
[Maple]: "One yen."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
Question:
[シナモン]: 「えっ……？」
[嘉祥]: 「最近は、応援されるほど、苦しくなるんだ」
[嘉祥]: 「そんなふうに感じることが一番嫌なのに……心に余裕がなくなっている自覚がある」
[嘉祥]: 「そして、恐くもある……いずれは、自分の心の問題なのに、その自覚すらできず、君たちを遠ざけてしまうんじゃないか、って……」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は君たちに感謝してる。だけど、独りになりたいと思う時間が増えてきてて……」
[嘉祥]: 「それが本当に嫌なのに……」
[嘉祥]: 「すまない。今だって……こんなことを言うべきじゃないって、頭では、わかっているのに……くっ……」
[シナモン]: 「うっ、ぐす……うぇ～～～」
[嘉祥]: 「すまない……」
[シナモン]: 「嘉祥さん、かわいそう～」
reference_answer:
[Cinnamon]: 「Huh...?」
[Kashou]: 「Lately, I feel like the more support I get from you guys, the more pain it causes me.」
[Kashou]: 「I absolutely hate feeling that way, but... I'm aware of the fact that I've been losing my composure.」
[Kashou]: 「And I'm afraid that eventually... even though it's all in my head, I won't be able to keep myself in check and I'll end up pushing you all away from me...」
[Kashou]: 「I'm so grateful to have you all, but I'm having more moments where I feel like I want to be by myself...」
[Kashou]: 「Even though I really hate that idea...」
[Kashou]: 「Sorry. Even now... I know in my mind that I shouldn't be saying that, and yet... Khh...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Ungh, sniffle... Waah~」
[Kashou]: 「I'm sorry...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Poor Kashou-san~」
ModelAnswer:
CINNAMON: "Eh...?"
KASHOU: "Lately, the more support I get, the more suffocated I feel."
KASHOU: "I hate feeling that way the most… and I’m aware that I’m running out of emotional space."
KASHOU: "And it scares me… eventually, this will be my own mental problem, but even realizing that might slip away from me, and I’ll end up pushing you all away…"
KASHOU: "I’m grateful to you all. But the times when I want to be alone are increasing…"
KASHOU: "And I hate that too…"
KASHOU: "Sorry. Even now… my head knows I shouldn’t say this… but… ugh…"
CINNAMON: "Ugh, sniffle… waaah~"
KASHOU: "I'm sorry..."
CINNAMON: "Kashou-san, you poor thing~"

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
Question:
[シナモン]: 「だって、苦しいから～……苦しすぎて、だから……言いたくないことも、口から出ちゃうって……」
[シナモン]: 「ううっ……言いたいことが……言えない気持ちも……言いたくないこと……言っちゃう気持ちも……」
[シナモン]: 「どっちも……ぐす……わかる……ううぅ……かなしい～……かなしいんですからぁ～……！」
[嘉祥]: 「シナモン……すまない……」
[シナモン]: 「あ、あやまらないで……ください。嘉祥さんは、悪くないんですよぅ～……！」
[シナモン]: 「嘉祥さんはぁ……ぐすっ……泣いていいんです～……っ。だって、悲しいんですから～」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は……」
そうか。これは、悲しいのか。
自分の実力のなさが……努力が報われない、失望が……
[メイプル]: 「くっ……あたしだって、泣けてくるわよ……」
reference_answer:
[Cinnamon]: 「I mean, you're in pain~... You're in so much pain, and that's why... you ended up saying what you didn't want to say...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Unghh... Not being able to say what you want to say... and saying what you don't want to say...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Either way... sniffle... I understand... Unghh... It's so sad~... It's so very saaad~...!」
[Kashou]: 「Cinnamon... I'm sorry...」
[Cinnamon]: 「D-Don't apologize... please. You aren't in the wrong here, Kashou-saaan~...!」
[Cinnamon]: 「Kashou-san, youuu... sniffle... you can let it out and cry~...! It is sad, after all~」
[Kashou]: 「I...」
I see. So this is sad?
My lack of skills is sad... The disappointment of my hard work going unrewarded is sad...
[Maple]: 「Khh... It makes me want to cry, too...」
ModelAnswer:
[Cinnamon]: "Because... because it hurts... It hurts so much, that's why... things I don't want to say just come out..."
[Cinnamon]: "Ugh... the feeling of wanting to say something... but not being able to... and the feeling of saying things I don't want to..."
[Cinnamon]: "Both... *sniffle*... I understand... *waaah*... it's sad... It's so sad, you know...!"
[Kashou]: "Cinnamon... I'm sorry..."
[Cinnamon]: "D-don't apologize... Please. Kashou-san isn't at fault here...!"
[Cinnamon]: "Kashou-san... *sniffle*... it's okay to cry... Because you're sad..."
[Kashou]: "I..."
So, this is sadness.
The inadequacy of my own skills... the frustration that effort doesn't pay off...
[Maple]: "Ugh... even I'm about to start crying..."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
Question:
[シナモン]: 「そ、それは～……」

[メイプル]: 「泣いてたって、美味しいケーキは作れないもの」
[嘉祥]: 「正論だな」
それだけに、耳が痛い。いや、心かな。
[メイプル]: 「今の嘉祥に必要なのは、心の余裕じゃないかしら？」
[嘉祥]: 「え？」
[メイプル]: 「いつもの嘉祥なら、あたしの励ましの言葉に、笑いながらありがとう。頑張るよって返したと思うわ」

[嘉祥]: 「そうかもしれない……でも、今は……」
[メイプル]: 「だから、あんたには心の余裕がなくなっている、と教えてあげたのよ」
[嘉祥]: 「納得はするけど……自分でコントロールできることじゃないからな」
reference_answer:
[Cinnamon]: 「W-Well~...」
[Kashou]: 「I get your point, but...」
[Maple]: 「No amount of crying is going to help you make a good cake.」
[Kashou]: 「That's a sound argument.」
That's why it's making my ears recoil. Or rather, my heart ache.
[Maple]: 「The thing you need right now, Kashou, is psychological composure, isn't it?」
[Kashou]: 「Huh?」
[Maple]: 「Normally, when I cheer you on, you give me a smile and reply, 'Thank you, I'll do my best.'」
[Cinnamon]: 「Aah~ That is true~ Kashou-san normally does that~」
[Kashou]: 「That may be true, but right now...」
[Maple]: 「Well, you just told us that you've been losing your composure.」
[Kashou]: 「I do agree, but... this isn't the sort of thing that you can just control on your own.」
ModelAnswer:
[Cinnamon]: "W-Well, that's..."
[Kashou]: "...I know, but still."
[Maple]: "You can't bake a delicious cake while you're crying, you know."
[Kashou]: "That's a fair point."
All the more reason why it stings. Or maybe it's my heart.
[Maple]: "Don't you think what Kashou needs right now is some emotional space?"
[Kashou]: "Huh?"
[Maple]: "The usual Kashou would've laughed and said 'Thanks for the encouragement!' and then 'I'll do my best.'"
[Cinnamon]: "Ah, yeah. If it was the usual Master..."
[Kashou]: "You might be right... but right now..."
[Maple]: "That's why I'm telling you, you've lost your emotional space."
[Kashou]: "I understand, but... it's not something I can control."  

(Note: "ご主人さま" is translated as "Master" following the character metadata. Honorifics like "さん" are omitted in the English translation for natural flow unless part of a name or alias.)

Question:
って、そんなわけあるか！いくら俺でも、妹のことを見間違えたりはしない。
[嘉祥]: 「なにやってるんだ、時雨……？」
[時雨]: 「……見つかってしまいましたか。兄様」

[嘉祥]: 「いや……パリでも、そんな貴族みたいなドレス姿は、そうそう見かけないんだが……」
パリは石畳の道が多く、階段を使うことも多く、ハイヒールは転倒の危険がある。女性でもスニーカーや革靴を履く者が多い。
そして、スリムなジーンズをはいている女性は多く、スカート姿の女性は珍しい。
服の色は黒か白だ。ベージュや柄物のアウターを着ているのは、おおねむ観光客だった。
[時雨]: 「残念です……完璧だと思ったのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、まぁ……その格好も似合ってるから、いいんじゃないか？」
reference_answer:
Yeah, as if! Not even I would mistake someone else for my little sister.
[Kashou]: 「What are you doing here, Shigure...?」
[Shigure]: 「...So, you ended up finding me, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「I was trying to perfectly blend in with the local people.」
[Kashou]: 「Uh, well... Even in Paris, you don't really see people running around with such an aristocratic-looking dress.」
Paris is full of stone-paved roads and you're often climbing stairs, so wearing high-heels is risky. Even the majority of ladies wear sneakers or leather shoes.
Also, most girls wear slim jeans, so girls in skirts are rare.
Their clothes are usually black or white. Mostly anyone wearing beige or patterned outerwear is a tourist.
[Shigure]: 「How unfortunate... I thought it was perfect...」
[Kashou]: 「Uh, well... Your outfit looks nice on you, so it's fine, right?」
ModelAnswer:
"Like, no way! Even I wouldn't mistake my own sister."
[Kashou]: "What are you doing, Shigure…?"
[Shigure]: "...You found me out, Brother."
[Shigure]: "I thought I'd blended in perfectly with the locals."
[Kashou]: "Well... even in Paris, you don't see many people wearing dresses like that noble's outfit..."
Paris has many cobblestone roads and stairs, making high heels a risk for falls. Many women wear sneakers or leather shoes.
Also, many women wear slim jeans; skirts are rare.
Clothing colors are mostly black or white. Those wearing beige or patterned outerwear were usually sleepy tourists.
[Shigure]: "How disappointing... I thought it was perfect..."
[Kashou]: "Well, uh... that outfit suits you too, so isn't it fine?"  

(Note: "ご主人さま" is translated as "Master," but in this context, "Brother" feels more natural for the sibling relationship. The honorific "-sama" is implied in the formal tone of "Brother.")
