[character] Name: Azuki (アズキ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[ココナツ]: 「うん、早く行こう、早く！」
[アズキ]: 「とかなんとか言って……クリスマスの街を嘉祥と歩きたかったんじゃねーのか、時雨？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[時雨]: 「あ、改めてそう言われると……」
[時雨]: 「もちろん、一緒に歩くことに喜びがないかと言えば……大ありです！」
[時雨]: 「でも……大切な日に、そんな……」
[嘉祥]: 「ほら、行こう、時雨。　待たせてるんだろう？」
[時雨]: 「はい、兄様！」
[嘉祥]: 「でも、一緒にって話なら、次からはもうすこし早い時間に来てくれよ？」
[嘉祥]: 「暗くなってから１人で出歩くなんて、危ないからな」
[時雨]: 「そうですね……気をつけます、兄様」
reference_answer:
[Coconut]: 「Yup, let's hurry back! Hurry!」
[Azuki]: 「Okay, that's what you say, but you just wanted to walk the Christmas streets with Kashou, didn't ya, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Shigure]: 「W-Well, when you phrase it that way...」
[Shigure]: 「Granted, if you asked me if walking together would make me happy, then... of course it would!」
[Shigure]: 「I mean... it's a special day, and doing so would...」
[Kashou]: 「Hey, let's go, Shigure. You don't want to make us wait for you, do you?」
[Shigure]: 「Coming, Nii-sama!」
[Kashou]: 「But if you wanted to walk together, try coming here a little earlier next time, all right?」
[Kashou]: 「Walking by yourself after dark can be dangerous, you know.」
[Shigure]: 「Yes, you're right... I'll bear that in mind, Nii-sama.」
ModelAnswer:
[Coconut]: "Yeah, let's go quickly, quickly!"
[Azuki]: "Or so she says... Didn't you really want to walk through Christmas town with Kashou, Shigure?"
[Shigure]: "Ugh..."
[Shigure]: "Ah, now that you put it that way..."
[Shigure]: "Of course, to say I don't enjoy walking together... that's a big fat lie!"
[Shigure]: "But... on such an important day, something like this..."
[Kashou]: "Come on, Shigure. Let's go. You're keeping them waiting, aren't you?"
[Shigure]: "Yes, Onii-sama!"
[Kashou]: "But if we're talking about doing it together next time, how about coming a little earlier?"
[Kashou]: "It's dangerous to be out alone after dark."
[Shigure]: "You're right... I'll be careful, Onii-sama."  

(Note: "Onii-sama" is an honorific for older brother.)

Question:
今夜のクリスマス・パーティーのために作ったケーキだ。
父親は何と言うだろうか？
俺は不思議な高揚感に包まれていた。
[一同]: 「メリー・クリスマスにゃ！メリ……クリメリー・クリスマスーメリー・クリスマス♪メリー・クリスマスです～♪メリー・クリスマスッ！！メリー・クリスマス」
[淡雪]: 「めりーくりすます」
[嘉祥]: 「って……親父は、どこいった？」
まさか、今回は顔を合わすこともしないつもりか？
[淡雪]: 「ふふ……心配しなくても、ちょっとしたら帰ってくるわ」
[淡雪]: 「町内会の呑み会に、差し入れに行っているだけだから」
[時雨]: 「それ、帰れなくなるのでは……？」
[淡雪]: 「最近はそういうの、無理に呑ませたり、付き合わせたりするのは、ダメらしいから」
reference_answer:
This is the cake I've made for tonight's Christmas party.
I wonder what dad will say about it?
I feel a strange sense of exhilaration coursing through me.
[Everyone]: 「Meowry Christmas!!Merry... Xmas.Merry Christmas!Merry Christmas♪Merry Christmas~♪Merry Christmas!!Merry Christmas!」
[Awayuki]: 「Merry Christmas!」
[Kashou]: 「Oh... Where did Dad go off to?」
Don't tell me he doesn't plan to show his face tonight?
[Awayuki]: 「Tee hee... No need to worry. He'll be back shortly.」
[Awayuki]: 「He's just going to the neighborhood association's drinking party to provide refreshments.」
[Shigure]: 「Isn't that the thing he doesn't come back home from...?」
[Awayuki]: 「As of late, it seems they're not allowed to do things like that—forcing people to drink, party along with them, things of that nature.」
ModelAnswer:
"Here's the cake I made for tonight's Christmas party.
I wonder what Father will say?
I was enveloped in a strange sense of elation.

[Everyone]: "Merry Christmas meow! Me... Crim-ery Christmas-mew Merry Christmas♪ Merry Christmas to you~♪ Merry Christmas!! Merry Christmas"

[Awayuki]: "Meh-ree Kurisu-masu"

[Kashou]: "Wait… where did Father go?"
Could it be he doesn't even intend to meet us this time?

[Awayuki]: "Fufu… don't worry, he'll be back soon."
"He just went to drop off some snacks at the neighborhood association's drinking party."

[Shigure]: "Doesn't that mean he won't be able to come back...?"

[Awayuki]: "Apparently, they're not supposed to force people to drink or make them stay anymore these days."  

(Note: "めりーくりすます" is a playful, childish pronunciation of "Merry Christmas," and I've kept the onomatopoeia "fufu" for Awayuki's giggle. Honorifics like "Father" are preserved as per the guidelines.)

Question:
[メイプル]: 「そういえば、時雨が勝手にフランスに行ったことは、ちゃんと許してもらえたの？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[シナモン]: 「ああ～、置き手紙１つだったから、お母さん怒ってましたよね～？」
[淡雪]: 「そうねー。相談もなしに急に行っちゃうものだから、心配したわー」
[時雨]: 「申し訳ありませんでした……」
[淡雪]: 「でもまぁ、嘉祥が一緒だったみたいだし」
[嘉祥]: 「俺も驚いたけどな」
[淡雪]: 「お土産のフィナンシェが美味しかったから許したわ♪」
母親は怒ると海より深く静かに怒るタイプだが、美味しい食べ物で、だいたい何でも許してくれるのだった。
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「That reminds me, did he ever forgive you for just up and going to France, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Aah~ You only left a letter behind, which made Mom upset, right~?」
[Awayuki]: 「That's right. She just ran off out of the blue without discussing it at all; it worried me sick.」
[Shigure]: 「I apologize for that...」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh well, it seems that you were with Kashou anyway.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, which was a surprise to me, too.」
[Awayuki]: 「The financier you gave me as a souvenir was delicious, so you're forgiven♪」
My mother is the type that when she gets angry, her anger is as deep and silent as the ocean. She forgives almost anything if you give her something tasty, though.
ModelAnswer:
[Maple]: "Speaking of which, did you ever get forgiveness for Shigure going to France without permission?"
[Shigure]: "Ugh..."
[Cinnamon]: "Oh~, she just left a note, so Mom was totally mad~?"
[Awayuki]: "That's right. She went off suddenly without even talking it over, so we were worried sick."
[Shigure]: "I am deeply sorry..."
[Awayuki]: "Well, I guess Kashou was with her."
[Kashou]: "I was surprised too, you know."
[Awayuki]: "And the financier biscuits she brought back were delicious, so I forgave her ♪"
Mom's anger runs deep and silent like the ocean, but she'll forgive almost anything for good food.  

(Note: "フィナンシェ" is transliterated as "financier," a type of French almond cake, to maintain context.)

reference_answer:

Question:
[時雨]: 「わぁ、クリスマスのプレゼントですか！？ありがとうございます、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「ちょっと早いかもしれないけれど、嘉祥ってば、また怒って帰っちゃうかもしれないでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[嘉祥]: 「そ、それは今日はないから！　信用してって」
[淡雪]: 「はい、嘉祥にも」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、うん……ありがとう」
[淡雪]: 「開けてみて？」
言われるがままに、包装紙を取って小箱を開けた。
[嘉祥]: 「……写真立て？」
写真は入っていないようだ。
[淡雪]: 「今年の想い出の１枚を部屋に飾ってみたら、楽しいと思うのよ？」
そういえば、母親が欲しがっていたとかで、誕生日に時雨がプレゼントしたのを思い出す。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Wow, a Christmas present?! Thank you so much, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「It might be a bit early, but Kashou just might get all huffy and go back home again.」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Kashou]: 「Th-That's not happening today! C'mon, believe me!」
[Awayuki]: 「And for you, too, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, yeah... Thanks.」
[Awayuki]: 「Open it.」
I remove the wrapping paper and open the small box as instructed.
[Kashou]: 「...A picture frame?」
It doesn't have a picture in it.
[Awayuki]: 「I think it'd be fun if you'd decorate your rooms with your best memory from this past year.」
That reminds me that my mother wanted a picture frame and Shigure got her one as a birthday present.
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "Wow, a Christmas present!? Thank you so much, Mother!"
[Awayuki]: "It might be a little early, but Kashou might get mad and leave again, right?"
[Shigure]: "Ugh..."
[Kashou]: "N-no, that won't happen today! Trust me."
[Awayuki]: "Okay, Kashou too."
[Kashou]: "Ah, yeah... thanks."
[Awayuki]: "Why don't you open it?"

As instructed, I removed the wrapping paper and opened the small box.
[Kashou]: "...A picture frame?"
It didn't seem to have a photo inside.
[Awayuki]: "I thought it would be nice to display one of this year's memories in your room?" 
Come to think of it, Shigure had given her mother one for her birthday because she'd wanted it.

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまの！　あ、でも、どの写真が……うーん……」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、ソレイユ開店記念のときの写真にする。　ご主人さまとバニラと３人で撮ったやつ！」

[メイプル]: 「あたしは、どうしようかしら？」
[シナモン]: 「アレがいいんじゃない～？　船で一緒に歌ったときの」
[シナモン]: 「動画だけじゃなく、写真も撮ってもらってたよね～？」
[メイプル]: 「あー。」
[メイプル]: 「……そうね。　ちょっと恥ずかしい気もするけれど」
[メイプル]: 「あれが、この１年で私にとって、一番大切な想い出だわ」

reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「One of Master! Oh, but, which one? Hmm...」
[Chocola]: 「Oh, I'll put in the photo to commemorate the opening of La Soleil. The one with you, Master, and Chocola!」
[Vanilla]: 「Nice. Good choice. I'll do the same.」
[Maple]: 「What should I go with?」
[Cinnamon]: 「Why not that one~? You know, the one of us singing on the boat together.」
[Cinnamon]: 「They didn't just take videos; there's photos from then, too, right~?」
[Maple]: 「Aah, yeah.」
[Maple]: 「...Right. I feel like that'd be kind of embarrassing.」
[Maple]: 「But that is the most precious memory of the year to me.」
[Cinnamon]: 「I'm going to be in... May-chan's most precious memory... Hah, hah... Uhhh...」
[Maple]: 「Huh? I'm picking one with just me in it, though...」
ModelAnswer:
CHOCOLA: "Master's! Oh, but which photo should I... Hmm..."
CHOCOLA: "Ah, I'll use the one from when La Soleil opened. The one where Master, Vanilla, and I are all together!"
VANILLA: "Good idea. Great choice. Me too."
MAPLE: "What about me?"
CINNAMON: "How about that one? From when we sang together on the ship?"
CINNAMON: "They took photos as well as video, right?"
MAPLE: "Ah..."
MAPLE: "...Yeah. It's a little embarrassing, though."
MAPLE: "But that's my most precious memory from this past year."
CINNAMON: "I'm in Mei-chan's most precious memory... I'm so happy... *huff huff* *sniffle*"
MAPLE: "Huh? But it's a photo of just me..."  

(Note: "Mei-chan" is an affectionate nickname for Maple, using the "-chan" suffix. The onomatopoeia "huff huff" and "sniffle" represent Cinnamon's emotional reaction.)
